attributes.additional_details: My sister recently had a major illness and was so overwhelmed by the care she received despite the burden faced by the medical staff.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear that your sister has been unwell and thankful to hear she was pleased with the care she received. We have the following petition with the same request already open which you may wish to sign: 

Ensure All National Health Staff receive a minimum 7.5% pay increase: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630102
